The following staff was present: (Management) , LMR Chairperson, Executive Assistant , AW Jermaine Darden, Captain , AHRM (Union) , President , Vice President , Chief Shop Steward , Shop Steward , Shop Steward , In-Training Old Business Items: August 7, 2019 Settled Arbitration Cases: (TABLED) UNION: The Union states Management has not complied with the local agreement. Union sent various e-mails and no response. Equipment was ordered to compensate for those who did not receive boots in accordance with the contract. 150 Park Row New York, New York 10007 August 7, 2019
, LMR CHAIRPERSON - EXECUTIVE ASSISTANT , PRESIDENT, LOCAL 3148 SUBJECT: LMR Committee Meeting Minutes August 7, 2019
The LMR Meeting was held on Wednesday, August 7, 2019, at 9:30 a.m. This meeting is a continuance of previous LMR meetings and the discussions of the old and current agenda items from those meetings.

The following staff was present: (Management) , LMR Chairperson, Executive Assistant , AW Jermaine Darden, Captain , AHRM (Union) , President , Vice President , Chief Shop Steward , Shop Steward , Shop Steward , In-Training

Old Business Items: August 7, 2019 Settled Arbitration Cases: (TABLED) UNION: The Union states Management has not complied with the local agreement. Union sent various e-mails and no response. Equipment was ordered to compensate for those who did not receive boots in accordance with the contract. (See previous LMR meeting minutes) The Union

additional_notes: The document appears to be a scanned copy of a meeting minutes document from the Metropolitan Correctional Center. The document contains some redacted names and is stamped with a DOJ-OGR number.
